attributes.action: Stop the government spending £900,000 on repainting Boris Johnson’s plane
attributes.additional_details: Because he could be using the money in ways that improve our currently poor economic climate, like funding small businesses or putting it towards scientific research concerning Coronavirus
attributes.background: I want the money to be put towards helping the poor and ending discrimination in our society, just because Boris is privileged and rich doesn’t mean he should be able to spend tax money on something so foolish

rejection.details: By the time your petition was started, the plane had already been painted. It's not clear what action can be taken now.
